Text:
Problems with magnets links are not fixed by upgrading your torrent client. 
how do i know?

noblesse3431 try a new torrent client
noblesse3431 - have u tried utorrent,and have u tried copy- paste of the info Hash code in the window that opens when u click get torrent ? - give it a try,IT WORKS

magnets links work for me.. however you can not choose which files to download or even see the files size or anything, in my opinion.............. Magnet links = Pure crap! I want the damn option of choosing which files within the torrent i want to download! Not possible with magnet crap!
Whats up with all the download buttons

With regard to magnets, if you don't want to download certain files of a torrent, select the files you don't want as soon as it's starts to download in your chosen client, then change their priority to 'Don't Download'. If you're having trouble with Magnets, completely remove what ever torrent client you are using & reinstall using the latest version. Fixes it everytime for me. Also, you don't need to like Magnets, they're doing the job just fine which is keeping torrents like this available to you & me.  Google it...
i agree with 19Grim80, the only way to sustain p bay is through magnets. its cause of that stupid bill in the us. same reason why p bay changed domain from .org to .se
